name: Netlify
description: Integrate with Netlify to list, get, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Sites
tools.description: List all Netlify sites accessible to the authenticated user. Returns site names, URLs, and deploy statuses.

tools.name: Get Site
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Netlify site by ID or custom domain.

tools.name: List Deploys
tools.description: List recent deploys for a Netlify site. Returns deploy IDs, states, commit messages, and timestamps.

tools.name: Create Deploy
tools.description: Trigger a new deploy for a Netlify site. Can clear cache and set a custom title for the deploy.

tools.name: List Forms
tools.description: List forms and their submission counts for a Netlify site.
